chart_description: This chart tracks the rate of TCP connections being opened on the IPv4 protocol. It includes both active and passive opens.

dimension_descriptions.ActiveOpens: The number of TCP connections initiated by this system that have not yet been completed. A high number of ActiveOpens indicates active clients connecting to the system.
dimension_descriptions.PassiveOpens: The number of TCP connections initiated by remote clients that have been accepted by this system. A high number of PassiveOpens indicates high volumes of incoming connections.
